4301110.name: The Headlands
4301110.description:
The Headlands is a cozy top-down farming strategy game set in a small village and an abandoned collective farm waiting for a fresh start.

Begin with the basics: an old tractor, a neglected field, and limited resources. Step by step, cultivate the land, sow your crops, harvest the yield, and gradually build a farm shaped by your decisions.

At its heart, the game is about rhythm and balance. You decide which fields to work first, when to invest in new machinery, and how to manage your time, fuel, and grain efficiently. There are no rushing timers or sudden punishments - only thoughtful planning and steady, satisfying progress.

Help your neighbors through contracts, unlock new opportunities, and turn a modest homestead into a living, thriving farm.
Start small. Give the land time. And watch everything begin to grow.
